Literature.Title: Tuning the antimicrobial pharmacophore to enable discovery of short lipopeptides with multiple modes of action.
Literature.Author: Fang Y, Zhong W, Wang Y, Xun T, Lin D, Liu W, Wang J, Lv L, Liu S, He J

Literature.Title: Ultra-short lipopeptides against gram-positive bacteria while alleviating antimicrobial resistance.
Literature.Author: Zhong C, Zhang F, Zhu N, Zhu Y, Yao J, Gou S, Xie J, Ni J

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 12600(MIC=>31.2µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>31.2µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 14053(MIC=>62.5µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=8µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=16µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=128µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 23857(MIC=16µM),Staphylococcus aureus 75(MIC=8µM),Staphylococcus aureus 113(MIC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=128µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=128µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=>128µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=64µM)
